General.Name: Chernan Metal Industrial
General.Description: Chernan Metal Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells tin and tin wire products in Taiwan. It also offers solder paste and flux products; copper and nickel; and germanium. The company was formerly known as Tunghui Tin Industry. Chernan Metal Industrial Corp. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.161, Wanshou Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
